topics.body:
So Toski made a review for Northwest Mansion Mystery

And it's TWO GODDAMN HOURS LONG

Just warning you guys before it gets uploaded and I link it here, you might wanna make sure you watch it when you have lots of free time, and please just have it on in the background when you're doing other things, because the visible video isn't the interesting part of it, the audio is what it's all about

^[spoiler]Unless you like staring at our faces for two hours in which case that's weird[/spoiler]^

topics.body:
Welp. I listened to the  2nd part of Anita Sarkeesians Damsels video. Her videos are very dry to be honest.

I had to ask one thing. "Wait. So having females have bad things happen to them is bad...but mowing through hordes of male mooks and bosses is a-okay?"

Also now I want a game where the damsel dies in typical dark fashion, but then you get to play as her ghost as she goes out for vengeance.

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e94c046368727533b10100#post_54e94c046368727533b10100
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]Welp. I just saw the comments about the upcoming MLP movie.

!http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m46hsaFoL41qb9xkb.gif!

I was expecting people to be excited. Man was I wrong. People have been asking for an MLP movie and when one's announced...they just say it's gonna be shit right off the bat?

I honestly don't get it. What am I missing here?[/bq]
Fandoms hate everything that their creators do because once anything exists it is immediately RUINED FOREVER
